page.title: 13RELIGION - TEVIOTHEAD
page.content: THERE IS A PRESBYTERIAN CHURCH AT TEVIOTHEAD. THE KIRK HAS A MEMBERSHIP OF ONE HUNDRED BUT THE AVERAGE NUMBER ATTENDING THE FORTNIGHTLY SERVICE IS TEN. THE CHURCH IS LINKED WITH THE OLD PARISH CHURCH IN HAWICK. THE MINISTER LIVES IN THE MANSE IN HAWICK AND SERVES BOTH CONGREGATIONS. RECENTLY A SUNDAY SCHOOL WAS SET UP. ATTEMPTS AT SUCH A VENTURE IN PREVIOUS YEARS FAILED DUE TO POOR SUPPORT, HOWEVER THERE ARE MORE YOUNGSTERS IN THE DISTRICT NOW. A DOZEN OF THE LADY MEMBERS FORM THE WOMEN'S GUILD WHO MEET MONTHLY DURING THE WINTER IN EACH OTHER'S HOMES.
